ol(address,uint32,uint32,uint256[])":{"details":"Add documentation.text:
@dev withdraw all tokens (of the sender) from pool, also harvest reward
 @param _pid: id of the pool

@dev harvest reward from pool for the sender
 @param _pid: id of the pool
@dev harvest rewards from multiple pools for the sender
@dev return the total of pools that have been added
@dev return full details of a pool

attributes.text:
@dev withdraw all tokens (of the sender) from pool, also harvest reward
 @param _pid: id of the pool

@dev harvest reward from pool for the sender
 @param _pid: id of the pool
@dev harvest rewards from multiple pools for the sender
@dev return the total of pools that have been added
@dev return full details of a pool

addPool(address,uint32,uint32,uint256[]).details: Add a new lp to the pool. Can only be called by the admin.

params._rewardPerBlocks: : amount of reward token per block for the pool
params._stakeToken: : token to be staked to the pool

deposit(uint256,uint256,bool).details: deposit to tokens to accumulate rewards

params._amount: : amount of stakeToken to be deposited
params._shouldHarvest: : whether to harvest the reward or not

emergencyWithdraw(uint256).details: emergency withdrawal function to allow withdraw all deposited token (of the sender)   without harvesting the reward

getPoolInfo(uint256).details: return full details of a pool

harvest(uint256).details: harvest reward from pool for the sender

harvestMultiplePools(uint256[]).details: harvest rewards from multiple pools for the sender

pendingRewards(uint256,address).details: get pending reward of a user from a pool, mostly for front-end

params._user: : user to check for pending rewards

poolLength().details: return the total of pools that have been added

renewPool(uint256,uint32,uint32,uint256[.details: Renew a pool to start another liquidity mining program

params._pid: : id of the pool to renew, must be pool that has not started or already ended
params._rewardPerBlocks: : amount of reward token per block for the pool   0 if we want to stop the pool from accumulating rewards

updatePool(uint256,uint32,uint256[]).details: Update a pool, allow to change end block, reward per block

params._rewardPerBlocks: : amount of reward token per block for the pool   0 if we want to stop the pool from accumulating rewards

withdraw(uint256,uint256).details: withdraw token (of the sender) from pool, also harvest reward

withdrawAll(uint256).details: withdraw all tokens (of the sender) from pool, also harvest reward
